attributes.action: Scrap all fossil fuel consumption by 2030 and replace it with renewable energy.
attributes.additional_details: The UK has an abundant source of natural, clean power, derived from the wind, waves and tides that surround us. Unlike traditional fossil fuels, nature’s energy will never run out. Switching to renewable energy is essential for reducing the devastating effects of climate change that will affect billions by the end of this century. It will also ensure we protect the natural environment for future generations.  - See more at: http://www.renewableuk.com/en/renewable-energy/#sthash.mPyjYRzE.dpuf
attributes.background: Switching to renewable sources of energy is vital if the UK is to do its part in the fight against climate change. Its time we ditch the old fashioned and unsustainable methods of producing energy and found a better and greener solution. Lets switch to sustainable energy and guarantee a greener UK!
